commit.message:
Test clippy_utils in CI

This makes sure that the tests in clippy_utils are run in CI.

When looking into this I discovered that two tests were failing and
multiple doc tests were failing. This fixes those tests and enables a
few more doc tests.

verification.payload:
tree 29d70c1c2f6f5eca9b6958bac935f309b589ee04
parent 790513056f8fc6aad10f479454d449da2892d284
author flip1995 <philipp.krones@embecosm.com> 1640026566 +0100
committer flip1995 <philipp.krones@embecosm.com> 1640026566 +0100

Test clippy_utils in CI

This makes sure that the tests in clippy_utils are run in CI.

When looking into this I discovered that two tests were failing and
multiple doc tests were failing. This fixes those tests and enables a
few more doc tests.

files.patch:
@@ -58,6 +58,10 @@ jobs:
       run: cargo test --features deny-warnings,internal-lints,metadata-collector-lint
       working-directory: clippy_lints
 
+    - name: Test clippy_utils
+      run: cargo test --features deny-warnings,internal-lints,metadata-collector-lint
+      working-directory: clippy_utils
+
     - name: Test rustc_tools_util
       run: cargo test --features deny-warnings
       working-directory: rustc_tools_util

@@ -121,6 +121,10 @@ jobs:
       run: cargo test --features deny-warnings,internal-lints,metadata-collector-lint
       working-directory: clippy_lints
 
+    - name: Test clippy_utils
+      run: cargo test --features deny-warnings,internal-lints,metadata-collector-lint
+      working-directory: clippy_utils
+
     - name: Test rustc_tools_util
       run: cargo test --features deny-warnings
       working-directory: rustc_tools_util
